src:
Istorijski meč na Maksimiru: Pobeda za novi stadion i proleće u LŠ
Dinamo dočekuje Šahtjor u okviru 4. kola grupne faze najeminentnijeg kontinentalnog takmičenja. Očekuje se druga najveća poseta otkako sus uvedeni brojači...

06 Nov 2019

Maksimir ovo ne pamti. Dinamo iz Zagreba igra večeras protiv Šahtjora (21.00) verovatno ključnu utakmicu u borbi za plasman u nokaut fazu Lige šampiona. Modri u odličnoj formi dočekuju istorijski duel koji bi mogao da ih odvede pred vrata raja i prezimljavanja u najeminentnijem kontinentalnom takmičenju prvi put. Istovremeno, potencijalno slavlje domaćih značilo bi da bi ukrajinski šampion ostao gotovo bez šanse.
Dobra izdanja izabranika trenera Nenada Bjelice nisu ostala neprimećena. Ljubitelji Dinama i fudbala hrle na stadion kako bi uživo svedočili pisanju istorije. Tako hrtvatski portal Index.hr piše da se večeras očekuje druga najveća poseta na Maksimiru otkako su se uveli brojači. Dosadašnji rekord drži utakmica protiv Nefčija u kvalifikacijama za Ligu šampiona 2011. godine. Na stadionu sagrađenom daleke 1912. godine tada se sakupilo 33.266 navijača, a ulaznice za utakmicu prodavale su se po simboličnim cenama.
Večeras se očekuje više od 30.000 ljudi, što bi utakmicu stavilo na drugo mesto po posećenosti, dok bi na treće mesto trebalo da sklizne susret protiv Malmea (30.065) takođe iz 2011. godine. Prošle sezone u osmini finala Lige Evrope Dinamo je protiv Benfike na Maksimiru gledalo 29.704 navijača.
Pre uvođenja brojača Dinamo je protiv Partizana 1997. godine gledalo oko 40.000 ljudi, protiv Marselja 1999. godine 38.000, a u ovom veku najposjećenija je bila utakmica protiv Arsenala 2006. godine 35.000.



Kormilar Modrih i jedan od najzaslužnijih za prijatnu situaciju u kojoj se nalazi hrvatski prvak dao je veliki intervju austrijskim medijima uoči važnog okršaja s Šahtjorom u 4. kolu Lige šampiona."Lane smo razbili evropsko prokletstvo, neporaženi prošli grupu Lige Evrope i ispali u osmini finala od Benfike. Šta želim da kažem: Dinamo je najveći klub u istočnoj Evropi, tu uključujem i Austriju. Igrao je 10, 11 puta u raznim grupnim fazama u poslednjih 15 godina, ali nikad nije prolazio dalje. Sad konačno jeste", rekao je Bjelica.
Nema dileme da nekadašnji strateg bečke Austrije i poljskog Leha uživa veliku popularnost u Zagrebu."Hoću li dobiti spomenik u Dinamu? Ma ne, najveći mi je spomenik atmosfera koju smo stvorili u Zagrebu. U prošlosti je raspoloženje oko Dinama bilo prilično negativno, a sad se 30.000 ulaznica za Atalantu rasproda u dve nedelje. Ipak, nije sve idealno. Infrastruktura je katastrofalna. Poljska je 20 godina ispred Hrvatske po tom pitanju. Poljaci imaju deset stadiona za 30.000 ljudi, a Hrvatska nijedan. Dinamo je spreman da sam izgradi stadion, ali to zavisi od politike, jer je zemljište u vlasništvu grada. Aktuelni sportski uspesi mogli bi da budu podsticaj da se nešto konačno dogodi. Pobeda protiv Šahtjora bi znatno pomogla. Dinamo je zaradio 35.000.000 evra. Dobri rezultati u Ligi šampiona donose ogroman novac u klupsku blagajnu pa imamo stabilnost i možemo da radimo u miru. Doduše svake godine moramo da prodamo najbolje igrače, ali imamo stabilan priliv prihoda i nove talente koji mogu da ih nadomeste", dodao je Nenad Bjelica.
Arijan Ademi, Kevin Teofil-Katerin i Emir Dilaver oporavili su se i trebalo bi da budu na raspolaganju treneru Bjelici, ali neće biti Amera Gojaka i verovatno Marija Gavranovića. Šahtjor će biti bez strelca uvodnog gola u Harkovu Jevhena Konopljanke.
U prvoj utakmici u Ukrajini pre dve nedelje Dinamo je bio vrlo dobar i izvukao je remi 2:2.

text:
Historical match at Maksimir: Victory for new stadium and spring in LŠ
Shakhtar are welcomed by Dynamo as part of the fourth round of the group stage of the most important continental competition. Expected second largest visit since the launch of counters ...

06 Nov 2019

Maksimir does not remember this. Dinamo Zagreb play against Shakhtar tonight (21.00), probably the key match in the fight for the Champions League knockout phase. The Wise Men in excellent form welcome a historic duel that could take them to the gates of paradise and hibernation in the quintessential continental competition for the first time. At the same time, a potential celebration of locals would mean that the Ukrainian champion would be left with almost no chance.
The good releases of coach Nenad Bjelica's selections have not gone unnoticed. Dinamo and football fans rush to the stadium to witness the writing of history. Thus, Croatian portal Index.hr writes that tonight is expected the second largest visit to Maksimir since the introduction of counters. The record so far holds the match against Nefchi in the 2011 Champions League qualification. The stadium, built far back in 1912, then attracted 33,266 fans and tickets for the game were sold at symbolic prices.
More than 30,000 people are expected tonight, which would put the game in second place in attendance, while the third should drop in a match against Malmo (30,065) also from 2011. Last season, 29,704 fans watched against Benfica at Maksimir in the eighth Europa League final.
Before the introduction of the Dinamo counter, about 40,000 people watched against Partizan in 1997, 38,000 against Marseille in 1999, and 35,000 were the most visited match against Arsenal in 2006.



Steering Wise and one of the most responsible for the cozy situation in which the Croatian champion is, gave a major interview to the Austrian media ahead of an important clash with Shakhtar in the 4th round of the Champions League. from Benfica. What I want to say: Dinamo is the biggest club in Eastern Europe, I include Austria as well. It has played 10, 11 times in various group stages over the last 15 years, but never went further. Now it finally is, "said Bjelica. .
There is no dilemma that the former strategist of Vienna Austria and Polish Leh enjoys great popularity in Zagreb. "Will I get a monument in Dinamo? No, my biggest monument is the atmosphere we created in Zagreb. 30,000 tickets for Atalanta are sold out in two weeks, however, not everything is perfect. Infrastructure is catastrophic. Poland is 20 years ahead of Croatia on this issue. Poles have ten stadiums for 30,000 people, and Croatia has none. but it depends on politics, because the land is owned by the city. Current sporting achievements could be an incentive for something to finally happen. A win against Shakhtar would greatly help. Dinamo made 35,000,000 euros. Good Champions League results bring huge money we have stability and we can work in peace, but every year we have to sell the best players, but we have a steady stream of revenue and new talents that can replace them, "added Nenad Bjelica.
Arian Ademi, Kevin Theophilus-Catherine and Emir Dilaver have recovered and should be available to coach Bjelica, but there will be no Amer Goyaka and probably Mario Gavranovic. Shakhtar will be without goal scorer in Yevhen Konoplyanka's Kharkiv goal.
In the first game in Ukraine two weeks ago Dinamo was very good and pulled out a draw 2: 2.
